scripts.deploy: source .env && cd contracts && forge create FourbyNFT --rpc-url $GOERLI_RPC_URL --private-key $GOERLI_PRIVATE_KEY --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY --verify --constructor-args "$GOERLI_OWNER_ADDRESS" contracts/src/fourby_nft.sol:FourbyNFT
scripts.deploy:anvil: source .env && cd contracts && forge script script/FourbyNFT.s.sol:FourbyScript --rpc-url=$FORGE_RPC_URL --private-key $FORGE_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast -vvvv && cd .. && npm run wagmi
scripts.dev:foundry: npm run dev & wagmi generate --watch & npm run anvil
